card.name: Absolute Grace
card.property: All creatures have protection from black.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In pursuit of Urza, the Phyrexians sent countless foul legions into Serra's realm. Though beaten back, they left it tainted with uncleansable evil.

card.name: Absolute Law
card.property: All creatures have protection from red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of law is unwavering. It is an iron bar in a world of water.

card.name: Abundance
card.property: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Abyssal Horror
card.property: Flying When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has no face of its own—it wears that of its latest victim.

card.name: Academy Researchers
card.property: When Academy Researchers enters the battlefield, you may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to Academy Researchers.

card.name: Acidic Soil
card.property: Acidic Soil deals damage to each player equal to the number of lands he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia had tried to take Urza's soul. He was relieved that Shiv tried to claim only his soles.

card.name: Acridian
card.property: Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Argoth were trained to ride these creatures, even when their mounts traveled upside-down.

card.name: Albino Troll
card.property: Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

card.name: Anaconda
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're smaller than the anaconda, it considers you food. If you're larger than the anaconda, it considers you a lot of food.

card.name: Angelic Chorus
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The very young and the very old know best the song the angels sing.

card.name: Angelic Page
card.property: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its bearers.

card.name: Annul
card.property: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.

card.name: Antagonism
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, Antagonism deals 2 damage to that player unless one of his or her opponents was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Arc Lightning
card.property: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

card.name: Arcane Laboratory
card.property: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It soon became obvious that some experiments were best overseen by fireproof teachers.

card.name: Argothian Elder
card.property: {T}: Untap two target lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sharpen your ears—Elvish expression meaning "grow wiser"

card.name: Argothian Enchantress
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

card.name: Argothian Swine
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Argoth, the shortest path between two points is the one the swine make.

card.name: Argothian Wurm
card.property: Trample When Argothian Wurm enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice a land. If a player does, put Argothian Wurm on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Attunement
card.property: Return Attunement to its owner's hand: Draw three cards, then discard four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The solution can hide for only so long."—Urza

card.name: Back to Basics
card.property: Nonbasic lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A ruler wears a crown while the rest of us wear hats, but which would you rather have when it's raining?"—Barrin, Principia

card.name: Barrin's Codex
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Barrin's Codex. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Barrin's Codex: Draw X cards, where X is the number of page counters on Barrin's Codex.

card.name: Barrin, Master Wizard
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is no more expensive than ignorance, and at least as satisfying."—Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Bedlam
card.property: Creatures can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes quantity, in the absence of quality, is good enough.

card.name: Befoul
card.property: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."—Radiant, archangel

card.name: Bereavement
card.property: Whenever a green creature dies, its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grief is as useless as love."—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

card.name: Blanchwood Armor
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Braid her branches, life fulfillingGoddess loving, Goddess killing."—Citanul chant

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The massive Argivian attack on their rooted kindred was a declaration of war to the treefolk.

card.name: Blasted Landscape
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Blood Vassal
card.property: Sacrifice Blood Vassal: Add {B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are bred to suffer and born to die. Much like humans."—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

card.name: Bog Raiders
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let weak feed on weak, that we may divine the nature of strength."—Phyrexian Scriptures

card.name: Brand
card.property: Gain control of all permanents you own. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By this glyph I affirm your role."—Urza, to Karn

card.name: Bravado
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We drive the dragons from our home. Why should we fear you?"—Fire Eye, viashino bey

card.name: Breach
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Brilliant Halo
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2. When Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Brilliant Halo to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bull Hippo
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How could you not hear it approach? It's a hippo!"—Argivian commander

card.name: Bulwark
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Bulwark deals X damage to target opponent, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It will be the goblin's first bath, and its last." —Fire Eye, viashino bey

card.name: Cackling Fiend
card.property: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

card.name: Carpet of Flowers
card.property: At the beginning of each of your main phases, if you haven't added mana to your mana pool with this ability this turn, you may add up to X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Islands target opponent controls.

card.name: Carrion Beetles
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.

card.name: Catalog
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without order comes errors, and errors kill on Tolaria."—Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Catastrophe
card.property: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

card.name: Cathodion
card.property: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

card.name: Cave Tiger
card.property: Whenever Cave Tiger becomes blocked by a creature, Cave Tiger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The druids found a haven in the cool limestone tunnels beneath Argoth. The invaders found only tigers.

card.name: Child of Gaea
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Child of Gaea unless you pay {G}{G}. {1}{G}: Regenerate Child of Gaea.

card.name: Chimeric Staff
card.property: {X}: Chimeric Staff becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Citanul Centaurs
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Echo {3}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Citanul Flute
card.property: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Citanul Hierophants
card.property: Creatures you control have "{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From deep in the caves beneath the forest, the hierophants planned the druids' raids against the enemy.

card.name: Claws of Gix
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Brotherhood of Gix dug out the cave of Koilos they found their master's severed hand. They enshrined it, hoping that one day it would point the way to Phyrexia.

card.name: Clear
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Cloak of Mists
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All we could lose, we did. All we could keep, we do. And both are shrouded by mists."—Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Confiscate
card.property: Enchant permanent (Target a permanent as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that permanent.) You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't understand why he works so hard on a device to duplicate a sound so easily made with hand and armpit."—Barrin, progress report

card.name: Congregate
card.property: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."—Song of All, canto 642

card.name: Contamination
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Contamination unless you sacrifice a creature. If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type and amount.

card.name: Copper Gnomes
card.property: {4}, Sacrifice Copper Gnomes: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Start with eleven gnomes and a room of parts, and come morning you'll have ten and a monster the likes of which you've never seen.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is not unusual for a single family of coral merfolk to spend centuries carefully guiding the growth of the reefs where they make their home.

card.name: Corrupt
card.property: Corrupt deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yawgmoth brushed Urza's mind, and Urza's world convulsed.

card.name: Cradle Guard
card.property: Trample Echo {1}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mother, sleep / Dream our livesOur roots your soul / Our leaves your bed.

card.name: Crater Hellion
card.property: Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

card.name: Crazed Skirge
card.property: Flying, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

card.name: Crosswinds
card.property: Creatures with flying get -2/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Harbin's ornithopter had been trapped for two days within the currents of the storm. When the skies cleared, all he could see was a horizon of trees.

card.name: Crystal Chimes
card.property: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Crystal Chimes: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.

card.name: Curfew
card.property: Each player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dark Hatchling
card.property: Flying When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus The Grand Evolution began."—Phyrexian Scriptures

card.name: Darkest Hour
card.property: All creatures are black.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth spent eons wrapping Phyrexians in human skin. They are the sleeper agents, and they are everywhere."—Xantcha, to Urza

card.name: Defensive Formation
card.property: Rather than the attacking player, you assign the combat damage of each creature attacking you. You can divide that creature's combat damage as you choose among any of the creatures blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your enemies will pound upon the door of your defenses, but only you shall have the key, and it is the key of life."—Song of All, canto 873

card.name: Despondency
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-0. When Despondency is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Despondency to its owner's hand.

card.name: Destructive Urge
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Red sky at night, dragon's delight.

card.name: Diabolic Servitude
card.property: When Diabolic Servitude enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. When the creature put onto the battlefield with Diabolic Servitude dies, exile it and return Diabolic Servitude to its owner's hand. When Diabolic Servitude leaves the battlefield, exile the creature put onto the battlefield with Diabolic Servitude.

card.name: Disciple of Grace
card.property: Protection from black Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Disciple of Law
card.property: Protection from red Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A religious order for religious order.

card.name: Discordant Dirge
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Discordant Dirge. {B}, Sacrifice Discordant Dirge: Look at target opponent's hand and choose up to X cards from it, where X is the number of verse counters on Discordant Dirge. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let Phyrexia breed evil in the darkness; my holy light will reveal its taint."—Serra

card.name: Disorder
card.property: Disorder deals 2 damage to each white creature and each player who controls a white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Then, just when the other guys were winnin', the sky threw up."—Jula, goblin raider

card.name: Disruptive Student
card.property: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."—Barrin, progress report

card.name: Douse
card.property: {1} {U}: Counter target red spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The academy's libraries were protected by fire-prevention spells. Even after the disaster, the books were intact—though forever sealed in time.

card.name: Dragon Blood
card.property: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire in the blood, fire in the belly.

card.name: Drifting Djinn
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drifting Djinn unless you pay {1}{U}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Drifting Meadow
card.property: Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Dromosaur
card.property: Whenever Dromosaur blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They say dromosaurs are frightened of dogs, even little ones. There are no dogs in Shiv. Not even little ones.

card.name: Duress
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We decide who is worthy of our works."—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

card.name: Eastern Paladin
card.property: {B} {B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their fragile world. Their futile lives. They obstruct the Grand Evolution. In Yawgmoth's name, we shall excise them."—Oath of the East

card.name: Electryte
card.property: Whenever Electryte deals combat damage to defending player, it deals damage equal to its power to each blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shivan inhabitants are hardened to fire, so their predators have developed alternative weaponry.

card.name: Elite Archers
card.property: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arrows fletched with the feathers of angels seldom miss their mark.

card.name: Elvish Herder
card.property: {G}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before Urza and Mishra came to Argoth, the herders prevented their creatures from stampeding. During the war, they encouraged it.

card.name: Elvish Lyrist
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bring the spear of ancient briar;Bring the torch to light the pyre.Bring the one who trod our ground;Bring the spade to dig his mound.

card.name: Enchantment Alteration
card.property: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

card.name: Endless Wurm
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Endless Wurm unless you sacrifice an enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ages ago, a party of elves took cover to let one pass. They're still waiting.

card.name: Endoskeleton
card.property: You may choose not to untap Endoskeleton during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+3 for as long as Endoskeleton remains tapped.

card.name: Energy Field
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources you don't control. When a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, sacrifice Energy Field.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.property: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage felt as though he'd been in the stasis suit for days. Upon his return, he found it was months.

card.name: Exhume
card.property: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."—Sitrik, birth priest

card.name: Exploration
card.property: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first explorers found Argoth a storehouse of natural wealth—towering forests grown over rich veins of ore.

card.name: Expunge
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Faith Healer
card.property: Sacrifice an enchantment: You gain life equal to the sacrificed enchantment's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of faith is quiet. It is the leaf unmoved by the hurricane.

card.name: Falter
card.property: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a sleeping dragon, Shiv stirs and groans at times.

card.name: Fault Line
card.property: Fault Line deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We live on the serpent's back.—Viashino saying

card.name: Fecundity
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

card.name: Fertile Ground
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

card.name: Fiery Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When Fiery Mantle is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Fiery Mantle to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fire Ants
card.property: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.

card.name: Flesh Reaver
card.property: Whenever Flesh Reaver deals damage to a creature or opponent, Flesh Reaver deals that much damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the reaver is horrifyingly effective, its dorsal vents spit a highly corrosive cloud of filth.

card.name: Fluctuator
card.property: Cycling abilities you activate cost up to {2} less to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fiko summoned only atogs for three straight sessions. The tutor couldn't decide whether to punish his failure or praise his consistency.

card.name: Fog Bank
card.property: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Fortitude
card.property: Enchant creature Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate enchanted creature. When Fortitude is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Fortitude to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gaea's Bounty
card.property: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest grew back so quickly that lumbering machines were suspended in the treetops.

card.name: Gaea's Cradle
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."—Gamelen, Citanul elder

card.name: Gaea's Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample. {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest rose to the battle, not to save the people but to save itself.

card.name: Gamble
card.property: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you've got nothing, you might as well trade it for something else.

card.name: Gilded Drake
card.property: Flying When Gilded Drake enters the battlefield, exchange control of Gilded Drake and up to one target creature an opponent controls. If you don't make an exchange, sacrifice Gilded Drake. This ability can't be countered except by spells and abilities. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Glorious Anthem
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once heard, the battle song of an angel becomes part of the listener forever.

card.name: Goblin Cadets
card.property: Whenever Goblin Cadets blocks or becomes blocked, target opponent gains control of it. (This removes Goblin Cadets from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you kids don't stop that racket, I'm turning this expedition around right now!"

card.name: Goblin Lackey
card.property: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Goblin Matron
card.property: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's always room for one more.

card.name: Goblin Offensive
card.property: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Goblin Patrol
card.property: Echo {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take the sharp metal stick and make a lotta holes."—Jula, goblin raider

card.name: Goblin Raider
card.property: Goblin Raider can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He was proud to wear the lizard skin around his waist, just for the fun of annoying the enemy.

card.name: Goblin Spelunkers
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It only short jump. You go first.""AIIIEEEE!""Hmm . . . we go different way now."

card.name: Goblin War Buggy
card.property: Haste Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gorilla beat its chest and threw great handfuls of leaves into the air. It howled challenge and showed its teeth. The mechanical soldier, not understanding, simply killed it.

card.name: Grafted Skullcap
card.property: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go your mind. Mine is fitter."—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

card.name: Great Whale
card.property: When Great Whale enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

card.property: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool for each enchantment you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fragile cocoon of dreaming will.

card.name: Shimmering Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Shiv's Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wear the foe's form to best it in battle. So sayeth the bey."

card.name: Shivan Gorge
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{R}, {T}: Shivan Gorge deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Shivan Hellkite
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{R}: Shivan Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dragon's scale can be carved into a mighty shield, provided you can procure a dragontooth to cut it.

card.name: Shivan Raptor
card.property: First strike, haste Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Show and Tell
card.property: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

card.name: Shower of Sparks
card.property: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

card.name: Sicken
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza dared to attack Phyrexia. Slowly, it retaliated.

card.name: Silent Attendant
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."

card.name: Skirge Familiar
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first Yawgmoth priest to harness their power was rewarded with several unique mutilations.

card.name: Skittering Skirge
card.property: Flying When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

card.name: Sleeper Agent
card.property: When Sleeper Agent enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it. At the beginning of your upkeep, Sleeper Agent deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Slippery Karst
card.property: Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Smokestack
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on Smokestack. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on Smokestack.

card.name: Smoldering Crater
card.property: Smoldering Crater enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.property: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Somnophore
card.property: Flying Whenever Somnophore deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Somnophore remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Songstitcher
card.property: {1} {W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

card.name: Soul Sculptor
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player casts a creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Does the stone mimic life, or did it once live?

card.name: Spined Fluke
card.property: When Spined Fluke enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Spined Fluke.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its spines are prized as writing quills by the priests of Gix.

card.name: Spire Owl
card.property: Flying When Spire Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Sporogenesis
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fungus counter on target nontoken creature. Whenever a creature with a fungus counter on it dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each fungus counter on that creature. When Sporogenesis leaves the battlefield, remove all fungus counters from all creatures.

card.name: Spreading Algae
card.property: Enchant Swamp When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. When Spreading Algae is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spreading Algae to its owner's hand.

card.name: Steam Blast
card.property: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

card.name: Stern Proctor
card.property: When Stern Proctor enters the battlefield, return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I preferred the harsh tutors—they made mischief all the more fun."—Teferi, third-level student

card.name: Stroke of Genius
card.property: Target player draws X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

card.name: Sulfuric Vapors
card.property: If a red spell would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was the dragons who first learned to chase their prey into the vapors before igniting them.

card.name: Sunder
card.property: Return all lands to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flow of time was disrupted; like a flooding river it rose from its banks. Tolaria was drowned in an instant that stretched toward infinity.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Symbiosis
card.property: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

card.name: Tainted Aether
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gix despised the sylvan morass. The gouge that the portal had torn in the forest was the only pleasing sight.

card.name: Telepathy
card.property: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most disappointing thing about learning telepathy is finding out how boring people really are."—Teferi, fourth-level student

card.name: Temporal Aperture
card.property: {5}, {T}: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. Until end of turn, for as long as that card remains on top of your library, play with the top card of your library revealed and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

card.name: Thran Quarry
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice Thran Quarry. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Thran Turbine
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may add {C} or {C}{C} to your mana pool. You can't spend this mana to cast spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Urza asked the viashino what it did, they answered: "It hums."

card.name: Thundering Giant
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

card.name: Time Spiral
card.property: Exile Time Spiral. Each player shuffles his or her graveyard and hand into his or her library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

card.name: Titania's Boon
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the winds rock the trees, listen for voices in the creaking of the trunks. If you hear your name, you are one of the Goddess's chosen.

card.name: Titania's Chosen
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Titania's Chosen.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do a hero and an arrow have in common? In times of war are many more made."—Elvish riddle

card.name: Tolarian Academy
card.property: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The academy worked with time—until time ran out.

card.name: Tolarian Winds
card.property: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

card.name: Torch Song
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Torch Song. {2}{R}, Sacrifice Torch Song: Torch Song deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of verse counters on Torch Song.

card.name: Treefolk Seedlings
card.property: Treefolk Seedlings's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The year that the brothers landed on Argoth, the trees produced five times as many seeds as normal.

card.name: Treetop Rangers
card.property: Treetop Rangers can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you can't catch them, cut the trees down from beneath them. Force them to fight on our terms."—Mishra

card.name: Turnabout
card.property: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best cure for a big ego is a little failure.

card.name: Umbilicus
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was the explorers' only tether to reality.

card.name: Unnerve
card.property: Each opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."—Xantcha, to Gix

card.name: Unworthy Dead
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Unworthy Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great Yawgmoth moves across the seas of shard and bone and rust. We exalt him in life, in death, and in between."—Phyrexian Scriptures

card.name: Urza's Armor
card.property: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tawnos's blueprints were critical to the creation of my armor. As he once sealed himself in steel, I sealed myself in a walking crypt."—Urza

card.name: Vampiric Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. Whenever a creature dealt damage by enchanted creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Vebulid
card.property: Vebulid enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Vebulid. When Vebulid attacks or blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: Veil of Birds
card.property: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veil of Birds is an enchantment, Veil of Birds becomes a 1/1 Bird creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When wind marries sky, even the bride's veil sings her praises.

card.name: Veiled Apparition
card.property: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Apparition is an enchantment, Veiled Apparition becomes a 3/3 Illusion creature with flying and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Veiled Apparition unless you pay {1}{U}."

card.name: Veiled Crocodile
card.property: When a player has no cards in hand, if Veiled Crocodile is an enchantment, Veiled Crocodile becomes a 4/4 Crocodile creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some roads are paved with bad intentions.

card.name: Veiled Sentry
card.property: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Sentry is an enchantment, Veiled Sentry becomes an Illusion creature with power and toughness each equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Veiled Serpent
card.property: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Serpent is an enchantment, Veiled Serpent becomes a 4/4 Serpent creature with "This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island." Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Venomous Fangs
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the pain of the shattered forest contained in a single drop.

card.name: Vernal Bloom
card.property: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many cultures have legends of a lush, hidden paradise. The elves of Argoth had no need of such stories.

card.name: Viashino Outrider
card.property: Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give thy ration to thy mount, if the road be long. So sayeth the bey."

card.name: Viashino Runner
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It moved this way, an' that way, an' then before I could stick it, it jumped over my head an' was gone."—Jula, goblin raider

card.name: Viashino Sandswimmer
card.property: {R}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Viashino Sandswimmer to its owner's hand. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Viashino Sandswimmer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few swim in a place of such thirst.

card.name: Viashino Weaponsmith
card.property: Whenever Viashino Weaponsmith becomes blocked by a creature, Viashino Weaponsmith gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within the rig settlement, those who have mastered the making of weapons earn highest honor.

card.name: Victimize
card.property: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The priest cast Xantcha to the ground. "It is defective. We must scrap it."

card.name: Vile Requiem
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Vile Requiem. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Vile Requiem: Destroy up to X target nonblack creatures, where X is the number of verse counters on Vile Requiem. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Voice of Grace
card.property: Flying, protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opposite Law is Grace, and Grace must be preserved. If the strands of Grace are unraveled, its design will be lost, and the people with it."—Song of All, canto 167

card.name: Voice of Law
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life's balance is as a star: on one point is Law, and Law must be upheld. If the knots of order are loosened, chaos will spill through."—Song of All, canto 167

card.name: Voltaic Key
card.property: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The key did not work on a single lock, yet it opened many doors.

card.name: Vug Lizard
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) Echo {1}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Wall of Junk
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Wall of Junk blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza saw the wall and realized that even if he tore every Phyrexian to pieces, they would still resist him.

card.name: War Dance
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on War Dance. Sacrifice War Dance: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of verse counters on War Dance.

card.name: Waylay
card.property: Create three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens. Exile them at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You reek of corruption," spat the knight. "Why are you even here?"

card.name: Western Paladin
card.property: {B} {B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their weak laws. Their flawed systems. They inhibit the Grand Evolution. In Yawgmoth's name, we shall erase them."—Oath of the West

card.name: Whetstone
card.property: {3}: Each player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To hone swords and dull minds.—Whetstone inscription

card.name: Whirlwind
card.property: Destroy all creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza tried to rule the air, but Gaea taught him that she controlled all the elements.

card.name: Wild Dogs
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Wild Dogs. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Wildfire
card.property: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shiv hatched from a shell of stone around a yolk of flame."—Viashino myth

card.name: Windfall
card.property: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."—Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Winding Wurm
card.property: Echo {4}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Entire trees were stripped of their bark and branches by the wurm's writhing path.

card.name: Wirecat
card.property: Wirecat can't attack or block if an enchantment is on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its purr is the sound of iron filings sliding down satin.

card.name: Witch Engine
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool. Target opponent gains control of Witch Engine. (Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.)

card.name: Wizard Mentor
card.property: {T}: Return Wizard Mentor and target creature you control to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although some of the students quickly grasped the concept, the others could summon only blackboards.

card.name: Worn Powerstone
card.property: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Worship
card.property: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Believe in the ideal, not the idol."—Serra

card.name: Yawgmoth's Edict
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia's purity permits no other."—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

card.name: Yawgmoth's Will
card.property: Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

card.name: Zephid
card.property: Flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once you've seen one, you'll understand why spells won't go near them.

card.name: Zephid's Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spells will shun you, as will everyone else.
